name: Arghcade - from the BundleofFriends
description:
Survival Scrappy 3rd person twinstick shooter.

Survive as long as you can, there is no escape. only arghcounting.

Music by Algal - Álvaro Galán Music
Song: The Wellerman Instrumental Sea Shanty
